fokus 0.0.9005
  • Reference

Read in and parse a TOML file as a strict list

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
read_toml.Rd

Reads in a file in Tom's Obvious Minimal Language format and returns its content as a (nested) strict list.

read_toml(path)

Arguments

path

The path to the TOML file. A character scalar.

Value

A strict list.

Details

The file is parsed using RcppTOML::parseTOML(escape = FALSE).

Examples

q_path <- fokus:::path_wd("questionnaire/questionnaire.toml")

if (fs::file_exists(q_path)) fokus::read_toml(q_path)
